alerts.description: This alert triggers, when logins for a single account are detected from various geographic locations which are unreachable in a short time period

alerts.briefdesc: New account with elevated privileges created on a resource
alerts.description: This alert triggers, when new account is created anywhere in the network and added to security-enabled groups. Such activity may indicate attacker trying to establish persistence and privilege escalation through T1136

logs.description: A member was added to a security-enabled universal group
logs.payload: {"EventID":4732,"EventName":"A member was added to security-enabled local group","Computer":"SRVDC02.company.cz","Subject":{"SecurityID":"company.cz\\Administrator","AccountName":"Administrator","AccountDomain":"company.cz","LogonID":999},"Member":{"SecurityID":"S-1-5-21-1966530601-3185510712-10604624-1013","AccountName":"-"},"Group":{"SecurityID":"BUILTIN\\Users","GroupName":"Users","GroupDomain":"Builtin"},"AdditionalInformation":{"Privileges":"-"}}
